GamerBitEvent: The event raised by the SparkFun gamer:bit pins
GamerBitPin: The pins used by SparkFun gamer:bit
PLTWController: Functions to operate the SparkFun gamer:bit
PLTWController.isPressed: Determines if a button is pressed
PLTWController.isPressed|param|button: the pin that acts as a button
PLTWController.onEvent: Registers code to run when a gamer:bit event is detected.
